extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void collectSinks(Graph graph) 
      private void finalizePageRankValues(CustomArrayList<Node> nodeList)
      After completing the PageRank counts the final PageRank-value using the PageRank formula
      private void handleSinks(CustomArrayList<Node> nodeList)
      Searches for sinks which are nodes with no outgoing edges and combines their PageRank divided by size of the list to a single value that is added to every other nodes PageRank later
      private void initializePageRankValueForNodes(CustomArrayList<Node> nodeList)
      Assigns every node the PageRank-value of 1 / n where n is the size of nodelist
      int pageRank(Graph g)
      Performs PageRank
      private void updatePageRankScore(Node n)
      Takes a node and updates its PageRank value by combining PR(X) / C(X) to every X where X is a node that references n and C(X) is the number of outgoing edges in X
      private void updatePageRankScoresAfterIteration(CustomArrayList<Node> nodeList, double combinedSinksPR)
      After every iteration reinitializes next PageRank value and updates the current PageRank to be the one that was marked the next value in previous iteration
      boolean validatePageRankResult(Graph g)
      Prints out every nodes PageRank and sums them together.

    • Method Detail

      • pageRank

        public int pageRank(Graph g)
        Performs PageRank
        Parameters:
        g - Graph that is going to be PageRanked
        Returns:
        number of iterations PageRank took to finish

      • collectSinks

        private void collectSinks(Graph graph)

      • finalizePageRankValues

        private void finalizePageRankValues(CustomArrayList<Node> nodeList)
        After completing the PageRank counts the final PageRank-value using the PageRank formula
        Parameters:
        nodeList - list of nodes that need to be assigned final PR

      • initializePageRankValueForNodes

        private void initializePageRankValueForNodes(CustomArrayList<Node> nodeList)
        Assigns every node the PageRank-value of 1 / n where n is the size of nodelist
        Parameters:
        nodeList - List of nodes that are initialized

      • updatePageRankScoresAfterIteration

        private void updatePageRankScoresAfterIteration(CustomArrayList<Node> nodeList,
                                                double combinedSinksPR)
        After every iteration reinitializes next PageRank value and updates the current PageRank to be the one that was marked the next value in previous iteration
        Parameters:
        nodeList - List of nodes that are updated

      • handleSinks

        private void handleSinks(CustomArrayList<Node> nodeList)
        Searches for sinks which are nodes with no outgoing edges and combines their PageRank divided by size of the list to a single value that is added to every other nodes PageRank later
        Parameters:
        nodeList - List of nodes where sinks are to be searched

      • updatePageRankScore

        private void updatePageRankScore(Node n)
        Takes a node and updates its PageRank value by combining PR(X) / C(X) to every X where X is a node that references n and C(X) is the number of outgoing edges in X
        Parameters:
        n - Node that is updated

      • validatePageRankResult

        public boolean validatePageRankResult(Graph g)
        Prints out every nodes PageRank and sums them together. If the combined value is 1, PageRank has been succesful
        Parameters:
        g - Graph that has been PageRanked
        Returns:
        boolean value based on if combined PageRank-value is 1
